Getting Started¶

Installation¶

Install LLMSQL from source:

git clone https://github.com/<your repo>/llmsql.git
cd llmsql
pip install -e .

Requirements:

  • Python 3.10+

  • PyTorch or CUDA environment (for inference)

  • vLLM (optional)

  • transformers

Quick Example¶

Run inference directly:

from llmsql.inference.inference_transformers import TransformersInference

model = TransformersInference(
    model_name="Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct",
    device="cuda"
)

query = "How many orders were placed in 2023?"
print(model.predict(query))

Evaluate a model end-to-end:

from llmsql.evaluation.evaluator import Evaluator

evaluator = Evaluator(dataset="spider")
results = evaluator.evaluate(model)
print(results)
